sqlMap.insert: INSERT INTO jforum_sessions ( session_id, session_user_id, session_start ) VALUES (?, ?, ?)
sqlMap.update: UPDATE jforum_sessions SET session_start = ?, session_time = ?, session_id = ? WHERE session_user_id = ?
sqlMap.select: SELECT session_time, session_start, session_id FROM jforum_sessions WHERE session_user_id = ?
